Description: Polygon centroid latitude in EPSG:4326, round off to 5 decimal places
Polygon centroid longitude in EPSG:4326, round off to 5 decimal places
Date of base map used for RTS delineation in YYYY-MM-DD for a single date, range of dates should be separated by a comma
Name of the satellite sensor used for RTS delineation
Resolution of the imagery used for RTS delineation (meters)
'Positive’ for genuine RTS and ‘Negative’ for background
UIDs of intersecting RTS that merged into one RTS
UIDs of intersecting stabilized RTS scars
Date of the contribution to the ARTS main file in YYYY-MM-DD
Unique identifier generated using uuid5 by concatenating all ‘Required-True’ fields as a single string
Image ID if a single image was used in polygon delineation
